about.title: About Travel-Rizz
about.intro: I created Travel-Rizz because I believe everyone deserves to experience the joy of perfectly planned travel, regardless of their planning expertise.
about.experience: Having spent years helping friends and family organize their trips, I noticed how overwhelming the process can be. Travel shouldn't be stressful - it should be an exciting journey right from the planning stage.
about.mission: That's why I combined the power of AI with my passion for travel to create Travel-Rizz, a tool that makes trip planning as enjoyable as the trip itself.

features.title: How We Make Travel Planning Effortless

aiChat.title: AI Chat Interface
aiChat.description: Have a conversation with Travel-Rizz about your dream trip. Share your ideas, and we'll help shape them into reality.

insights.title: Dynamic Travel Insights
insights.description: Travel with confidence knowing you have all the essential details - from weather patterns to local customs - right when you need them.

routes.title: Visualised Route Planning
routes.description: See your daily adventures come to life with interactive maps. Optimize your routes and make the most of every day of your journey.

itinerary.title: Flexible Itinerary Builder
itinerary.description: Easily organize and reorganize your plans with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Your perfect itinerary is just a few clicks away.

hero.title: Plan Your Dream Trip Effortlessly
hero.subtitle: Let's plan your perfect journey together, combining human expertise with AI assistance to create a personalized trip that's uniquely yours. No more overwhelming planning - just the joy of looking forward to your next adventure.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Get access for a single payment. We're exploring subscription options for frequent travelers, but will always keep one-time pricing available.
